name: Madrid City Tour-See All The Major Attractions Of The Spanish Capital In One Day
description:
Discover the magic of Madrid on a half day tour (morning or afternoon) and explore all the major sights of the capital of Spain. You will discover a fascinating city with spectacular architecture, bustling modern areas, and great nightlife.

This half day tour is ideal if you’re a first-time visitor to Madrid. You will get a well-rounded introduction to the city’s sights and have the morning or afternoon free to explore on your own. We will also give you the best travel advice so you know where to go, what to see, and the best dining options for the rest of your Madrid visit.
